Class BenevolentPlayerController

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Strategy
    public class BenevolentPlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Strategy
    This controller as any other controller class in the observer pattern will update the view whenever it is changed and is responsible for data flow into the model
